com.simsilica.lemur.event

Class AbstractCursorEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.event.AbstractCursorEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CursorButtonEvent, CursorMotionEvent

    public abstract class AbstractCursorEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for events related to cursor interactions with spatials.
